Text: Okay, I guess I will be the first to comment on this one. The overall quality is pretty good; definitely DVDRip. Could of done without all the fluff in the download and description but whatever. Thank you uploader.

@vivatpb5776
Should you ever decide to become an uploader you'll understand that many sites require descriptions and the artwork.  I add Pirate Party info to spread the word and the text files are required of the tracker, and I include my monicker to promote my torrents, so it's not "fluff" you Muppet.
